task.title: Task: Column Chart
task.shortdesc: A chart type that is very suitable for displaying time series.

context.p: If time units like years, quarters, months, weeks, and days are part of the data, then column charts are the most suitable type. Don't use too many data points. Five to six values are maximum. When you have more than 6 values on the horizontal axis then it is better to choose a line chart.
